channel.title: How to connect to Redash in Docker installation in Mac
channel.description:
I followed below steps to install redash but getting error while installing. Please help me to install redash in local and also able to connect through Docker
``` git clone https://github.com/getredash/redash.git cd redash npm install npm run build docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml run --rm server create_db docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml up ```

item.title: How to connect to Redash in Docker installation in Mac
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
Docker support on M1 is still in beta, I believe. Check out this thread where a user successfully set up Redash on an M1 Macbook Air.

Read full topic

item.title: How to connect to Redash in Docker installation in Mac
item.dc:creator: anshulhiran
item.description:
I tried installing redash through https://redash.io/help/open-source/dev-guide/docker
But got below error
Unable to locate package msodbcsql17
executor failed running [/bin/sh -c apt-get update && apt-get install -y curl gnupg build-essential pwgen libffi-dev sudo git-core wget libpq-dev g++ unixodbc-dev xmlsec1 libssl-dev default-libmysqlclient-dev freetds-dev libsasl2-dev unzip libsasl2-modules-gssapi-mit && curl https://packages.microsoft.com/keys/microsoft.asc | apt-key add - && curl https://packages.microsoft.com/config/debian/10/prod.list > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/mssql-release.list && apt-get update && ACCEPT_EULA=Y apt-get install -y msodbcsql17 && apt-get clean && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*]: exit code: 100
ERROR: Service ‘server’ failed to build : Build failed

Please help in installing the redash in local.

Read full topic
item.source: How to connect to Redash in Docker installation in Mac

item.title: How to connect to Redash in Docker installation in Mac
item.dc:creator: anshulhiran
item.description:
I followed below steps to install redash but getting error while installing. Please help me to install redash in local and also able to connect through Docker

git clone https://github.com/getredash/redash.git
cd redash
npm install
npm run build
docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml run --rm server create_db
docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml up

Read full topic
item.source: How to connect to Redash in Docker installation in Mac
